ComicInfo.Title: Rosalba Fritz Martinez; Isla of the Islands; I Come From Above to Avoid a Double Chin
ComicInfo.Summary:
This is volume four in the series. Uses the same oversize magazine format as volume one.
Vol. 1- 1982-1996 (50 issues in magazine format) Vol. 2- 2001-2007 (20 issues in standard US comic book periodical format) Vol. 3- 2008-2016 (8 issues as Love and Rockets: New Stories in trade paperback format)
Comes with at least one cover variant per issue available exclusively from the publisher. Each variant has its own individual front & back cover.Available from the publisher's web site a week before the official store release date.Rosalba Fritz Martinez: Anima battles the Hellmets but a further adversary awaits.
Isla of the Islands: Tonta and Gwen try to sell their mini-comic at a zine festival.
I Come From Above to Avoid a Double Chin: The old gang at the Huerta punk reunion as Joey drags them into the mosh pit.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-03-22 15:07:35. [Issue ID 1638804]
